trans-unit.source: Allows a custom override of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*> logic associated with a dependency property that is defined on a dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Consente un override personalizzato del <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*>logica associata a una proprietà di dipendenza che è definita in un oggetto di dipendenza.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.SetValue*>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The implementation of this delegate can be set to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A> property of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> while calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]L'implementazione del delegato è possibile impostare la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata>durante la chiamata <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.PropertyMetadata.SetValueOverride%2A>
